entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 6:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
